AUDIOPHONICSONOFF.D_GPIOCONFIG: Configure the GPIO pins to use for the Audiophonics card and on/off button.
AUDIOPHONICSONOFF.D_SOFTSHUTDOWN: Controls which GPIO pin is activated when a shutdown is initiated from software.
AUDIOPHONICSONOFF.D_SHUTDOWNBUTTON: Controls which GPIO pin is activated when the hardware button is pressed.
AUDIOPHONICSONOFF.D_BOOTOK: Controls which GPIO pin is activated after booting successfully.
